description:
CSShim expands the ability to create Portable Class Libraries from .NET legacy code by providing reduced or dummy implementations of .NET Framework classes that are not represented in PCL.

The package was initially developed to support the PCL adaptations of the following projects: fo-dicom (https://github.com/cureos/fo-dicom), AForge.NET (https://github.com/cureos/aforge), Accord.NET (https://github.com/cureos/accord) and  Encog (https://github.com/cureos/encog-dotnet-core).
releaseNotes:
v 0.9.3-pre1
------------
* Changed WPA81 assembly to Universal (win81+wpa81)
* Added a few missing implementations

v 0.9.2-pre7
------------
* Added enums in BindingFlags to enable sufficient binding in InvokeMember

v 0.9.2-pre6
------------
* Added empty Binder class and added enums in BindingFlags
* Use native methods where available in specific target assemblies
* Replaced DataColumnExtensions method with equivalent instance property
summary: CSShim provides .NET Framework types otherwise missing in PCL.
title: CSShim
